<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sequences of adjacent SMEM and VMEM instructions if XNACK is enabled. A</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="comment">/// load that would overwrite a pointer would require breaking the soft clause.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Artificially extend the live ranges of the pointer operands by adding</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="comment">/// implicit-def early-clobber operands throughout the soft clause.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
